Hi guys,

I've been using H3 for a while now, and recently updated to the l=
atest (3.1 I believe) version, and found out that the "pauseAtFinish" prope=
rty is gone.

Any reasons for getting rid of it? It's just, it has been rea=
lly useful for me so far, as I automatically schedule seeds from a database=
, and when a job is finished, it just gets paused, and when a new seed entr=
y is inserted into the DB, it is scheduled and the frontier is unpaused aut=
omatically.

Is there any other ways setting that "pauseAtFinish" parameter=
?

Regards,
progre55
